remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TabPanel> serves as an item host for the tab items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>. It determines the correct sizing and positioning for tab items and handles the logic for multiple rows of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects.
